data.name: checkBoxTransliterateAdditional.ToolTip
data.value: Transliterate additional information like book description (enable for readers without support of cyrillic fonts)

data.name: checkBoxTransliterateFileName.ToolTip
data.value: Transliterate file name (enable for readers that display file names in directory but do not have support for cyrillic fonts)

data.name: checkBoxTransliterateTOC.ToolTip
data.value: Transliterate book's Table Of Content (enable for readers without support of cyrillic fonts)

data.name: textBoxNoSeriesFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format: %bt% - BookTitle from FB2 header Also following modifiers specified after '.' (dot) are allowed for %bt%, $sf% and %sa%: c - Capitalize, l - lowercase, u -UPPERCASE

data.name: labelNoSeries.ToolTip
data.value: Format book title description info string , This allows to define what will be displayed on book description page if book is not part of series

data.name: checkBoxAddSequences.ToolTip
data.value: Enable/disable addition of abbreviated secuence names to the book title name

data.name: textBoxNoSequenceFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format: %bt% - BookTitle from FB2 header %sf% - Serie full name from FB2 header %sa% - Serie abbviarated name from FB2 header Also following modifiers specified after '.' (dot) are allowed for %bt%, $sf% and %sa%: c - Capitalize, l - lowercase, u -UPPERCASE

data.name: labelNoSeqFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format book title description info string , This allows to define what will be displayed on book description page if book is part of series but does not have series number

data.name: textBoxSequenceFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format: %bt% - BookTitle from FB2 header %sf% - Serie full name from FB2 header %sa% - Serie abbviarated name from FB2 header %sn% - book number in the series Also following modifiers specified after '.' (dot) are allowed for %bt%, $sf% and %sa%: c - Capitalize, l - lowercase, u -UPPERCASE additionaly for parameter %sn% numeric modifier can be used to specify 0-preffix of the number

data.name: labelSeqFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format book title description info string, This allows to define what will be displayed on book description page

data.name: textBoxFileAsFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format: %f% - First name from FB2 header %m% - Middle name from FB2 header %l% - last name from FB2 header %n% - Nick name from FB2 header Also following modifiers specified after '.' (dot) are allowed for %f%, %m%, %l% and %n%: c - Capitalize, l - lowercase, u -UPPERCASE additionally another subformat :b can be added to take name in brackets

data.name: labelFileAsFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format "File As" author name , This allows to define what will be displayed on book description page

data.name: textBoxAuthorFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format: %f% - First name from FB2 header %m% - Middle name from FB2 header %l% - last name from FB2 header %n% - Nick name from FB2 header Also following modifiers specified after '.' (dot) are allowed for %f%, %m%, %l% and %n%: c - Capitalize, l - lowercase, u -UPPERCASE additionally another subformat :b can be added to take name in brackets

data.name: labelAuthorFormat.ToolTip
data.value: Format author name , This allows to define what will be displayed on book description page

data.name: comboBoxFixMode.ToolTip
data.value: "None" - do not try to fix "Internal" - try to fix using conservative method (only basic errors fixed) "Fb2Fix" - try to fix as much as possible using Fb2Fix

data.name: labelFixMode.ToolTip
data.value: Mode used to attempt to fix broken and non-valie FB2s

data.name: checkBoxSkipAboutPage.ToolTip
data.value: If enabled will skip generation of ePub About page

data.name: checkBoxCapitalize.ToolTip
data.value: If enabled the first character of each chapter is displayed as capital drop

data.name: checkBoxEmbedStyles.ToolTip
data.value: Invokes "embeding styles mode" that, instead of adding CCS files to the ePub and referencing them, in xHTML injects the relevant style code directly into the xHTML files (enable for some buggy readers)

data.name: checkBoxFlatStructure.ToolTip
data.value: Enable to make generated ePubs to have "flat structure" - do not have subfolders (required by some buggy readers, disable otherwise)

data.name: checkBoxConvertAlphaPNG.ToolTip
data.value: Enable to convert all PNG files with Alpha channel to 32bit (some readers like Sony/ADE can not display PNG files with Alpha channel set)

data.name: checkBoxFb2Info.ToolTip
data.value: Enable to add FB2 information data (file creator, software , etc) to the resulting ePub book

data.name: checkBoxVisibleInGUI.ToolTip
data.value: Check to show path as converter GUI destination

data.name: checkBoxVisibleInExt.ToolTip
data.value: Check to show path as shell extension destination target

data.name: buttonDeletePath.ToolTip
data.value: Delete currently selected path from the list of paths

data.name: buttonReset.ToolTip
data.value: Drop changes and reset to initial state
